alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Moore; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 6:43PM EDT until September 09 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Moore County in central North Carolina... North central Scotland County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Montgomery County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Richmond County in central North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 643 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hoffman, or 13 miles southwest of Southern Pines, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Biscoe, Hoffman, Pinebluff, Ellerbe, Foxfire, Candor, Norman, Derby, Sandhills Game Land and Camp Mackall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
